verbose_text: Further depletion of Smad4 in Pten d/d mice results in activation of ErbB2, probably through the downregulation of ERRFI1, and further activates Akt signaling pathway and induces expression of ERBB2 target genes including Elf3, which promoted lung tumor growth and progression.
evidence: Smad4 in Pten d/d  mice results in activation of ErbB2
